deity_markdown: [Aroden](/Deities.aspx?ID=512), [Baalzebul](/Deities.aspx?ID=394), [Cayden Cailean](/Deities.aspx?ID=280), [Chaldira](/Deities.aspx?ID=336), [Guardians Of The Sacred Self](/Deities.aspx?ID=379), [Hadregash](/Deities.aspx?ID=503), [Jezelda](/Deities.aspx?ID=431), [Lahkgya](/Deities.aspx?ID=615), [Rokoga Gin](/Deities.aspx?ID=629), [The Laborer's Bastion](/Deities.aspx?ID=253), [Uvuko](/Deities.aspx?ID=682), [Yog-Sothoth](/Deities.aspx?ID=580), [Yrmidar](/Deities.aspx?ID=500)

<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=1531)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 332 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Aroden](/Deities.aspx?ID=512), [Baalzebul](/Deities.aspx?ID=394), [Cayden Cailean](/Deities.aspx?ID=280), [Chaldira](/Deities.aspx?ID=336), [Guardians Of The Sacred Self](/Deities.aspx?ID=379), [Hadregash](/Deities.aspx?ID=503), [Jezelda](/Deities.aspx?ID=431), [Lahkgya](/Deities.aspx?ID=615), [Rokoga Gin](/Deities.aspx?ID=629), [The Laborer's Bastion](/Deities.aspx?ID=253), [Uvuko](/Deities.aspx?ID=682), [Yog-Sothoth](/Deities.aspx?ID=580), [Yrmidar](/Deities.aspx?ID=500)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +30-foot status bonus to your Speed.
name: Fleet Step
